channel.title: Need Help(For Very Advanced Coders)
channel.description:
Hi guys, its me Rangdalton and i'm going to start a major project that i will need the help of a lot of experienced coders. I am going to make a mini game, not just an ordinary minigame. I want it to be like gnome ball except were i can edit it were they have a certain percentage of chamce of tackling you, and i want to change the apperance of the ball, and when you throw it, and also the goal, i also want to make it were other players can block it, such as if the player is in front of the player that i being thrown too, the player in front will catch it and intercept it. I also want to change the place were u play it. Btw i am using d d s p 3 c source so pm as soon as you can!!!
~Rangdalton
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ proud owner of Graye-Scape
